#Text= Bolin says : " Uh , hello , Amon , sir .

column1: #Text=I think there 's been a big misunderstanding .
#Text=" Mako says : " Bolin , you all right ?
#Text=" Lieutenant says : " You benders need to understand , there 's no place in the world for you anymore .
#Text=" Korra says : " I would n't count us out just yet .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Hah ... Oh ... Yah ... Stop ... I want ... to be ... on ... your back ... please !
#Text=She 's the perfect messenger to tell the city of my power .
